name: Creme Brulee
author: Sara Snider
instructions: Preheat oven to 325Â°. Place cream, Vanilla bean, & pulp into med. sauce pan over med-high heat & bring to boil. Remove from heat, cover for 15 min. Whisk 1/2 cup sugar, & egg yolks until well blended & light in color. Slowly add cream while stirring. Pour into 6 romekins. Place in large roasting pan. Pour enough water to come half way up on the romekins. Bake 40 to 45 min or until set. Refrigerate at least 2 hrs. Remove from refrigerater. Pour sugar on top, melt with torch for crispy top. Cool 5 min. before serving
